author: Wilsker
body:
Aesthetic changes to x-axis range and binning in 'total number of off-track clusters' histograms.

Files changed:
- DQM/SiStripMonitorTrack/src/SiStripMonitorTrack.cc: shrink x-axis range to better fit distributions shown in DQM GUI.
- DQM/SiStripMonitorTrack/python/SiStripMonitorTrack_cfi.py: Default range needed extending (can only shrink x-axis of original root histograms).
title: Aesthetic changes to off-track cluster histograms
